contents: "Feb 18, 2021 - Biden's plan to revive U.S. manufacturing, One way the Biden administration says it's planning to help the nation's economy during the pandemic is by investing billions of dollars to revive U.S. manufacturing.  Noam Scheiber, labor and workplace reporter for The New York Times, joins CBSN's ""Red & Blue"" anchor Elaine Quijano with a breakdown of the proposal as well as bipartisan concerns over China's industrial ambitions."
